typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameter1 as string (SAL+COMM),
	parameter2 as string (SAL+COMM)
}
source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> adlssrcemp
adlssrcemp select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeNumber = EMPNO,
		JustName = ENAME,
		Occupation = JOB,
		Salary = SAL,
		Commission = COMM,
		DepartmentNumber = DEPTNO
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumns
SelectedColumns derive(total = toInteger(Salary) + iifNull(toInteger(Commission),0)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(DepartmentNumber==10) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sort(desc(toInteger(Salary), true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> blobtargetemp
